course_description: Unlock the power of programming with this beginner-friendly course on Python. Learn essential coding skills from scratch, build real projects, and gain confidence to create your own applications. Ideal for newcomers to tech.
course_overview: This course provides a thorough foundation in Python programming for absolute beginners. Starting with installation and basic syntax, you'll progress through variables, data types, operators, control flow (if statements, loops), functions, data structures (lists, tuples, dictionaries, sets), string manipulation, file I/O, exception handling, and introductory modules. Hands-on exercises, quizzes, and capstone projects ensure practical mastery. By the end, you'll be equipped to tackle intermediate topics and real-world coding challenges.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no programming experience, students, career switchers entering tech, and hobbyists interested in automation and data analysis.
learning_outcomes: Install and set up Python environment
Write and execute basic Python scripts using variables and data types
Implement control structures including conditionals and loops
Define, call, and debug custom functions
Manipulate collections like lists, dictionaries, and strings
Read from and write to files
Handle common errors with exception handling
Build simple programs to solve practical problems
